Package com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration.Convertors

Interface Summary
Converter<T> The Converter interface defines methods to transform a raw String value to generic value T and vice versa.
ConverterRegistry ConverterRegistry acts as a converter repository and defines method to add, retrieve and clear Converter from the registry.
 

Class Summary
DateConverter Converts a Date to a String and vice versa.
DefaultConverterRegistry Provides a Map based implementation of ConverterRegistry
DoubleConverter Converts a Double to String and vice verca.
FileConverter Converts a String to File and vice versa.
FloatConverter Converts a String to Float and vice versa
IntegerConverter Converts an Integer to String and vice versa
LongConverter Converts a String to Long and vice versa
StringConverter Dummy converter that gets invoke during String transformation.
URIConverter Converts a String to URI and vice versa
